title: List of all Android material components  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android material components  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: MaterialDesignLibrary
repoList.description: This is a library with components of Android L to you use in android 2.2

repoList.name: material
repoList.description: A library to bring fully animated Material Design components to pre-Lolipop Android.

repoList.name: MaterialChipsInput
repoList.description: Implementation of Material Design Chips component for Android

repoList.name: BottomBar
repoList.description: (Deprecated) A custom view component that mimics the new Material Design Bottom Navigation pattern.

repoList.name: material-motion-android
repoList.description: Reactive motion for Android. Deprecated; please use the Motion library in Material Components for Android instead: https://material.io/develop/android/theming/motion/.

repoList.name: material-components-android-compose-theme-adapter
repoList.description: A library that enables reuse of Material themes defined in XML for theming in Jetpack Compose.

repoList.name: MaterialStepper
repoList.description: MaterialStepper is a custom Android View Library inspired by:  https://material.io/guidelines/components/steppers.html

repoList.name: android-mvp-material-and-realm
repoList.description: This contains following features 1) This demo follows MVP architecture . 2) In this demo I have used some material and new design library components such as -Toolbar -RecyclerView (Swipe on item) -swipe item right to delete -swipe item to update -CardView -SnackBar 3) Some basic functionality with Realm for Android

repoList.name: GingerMaterialRepo
repoList.description: An Eclipse IDE supported library to bring fully animated Material Design components to pre-Lolipop Android. Ref.:http://rey5137.com/material/

repoList.name: material-swipe-cards
repoList.description: An Androd custom view component that allow to manage material-style cardViews on a swipe controller and everyone with a distinct structure and layout.
